property.name: Description
property.value: Test of the initialization of CarSensorSwc

property.name: Test_Step_0
property.value: 1. Check that the initial values are properly loaded into globar variables

property.name: Description
property.value: Test the reception of the message NavPos_02 and the sending to the NAD

property.name: Test_Step_1
property.value: 1. Check that the NavPos_02 is not sent do the NAD when the conditions are not fulfilled

property.name: Test_Step_2
property.value: 2. Check that the NavPos_02 is not sent do the NAD when the conditions are not fulfilled

property.name: Test_Step_3
property.value: 3. Check that the NavPos_02 is sent do the NAD when the conditions are fulfilled. Tested with Lat and Long INIT values

property.name: Test_Step_4
property.value: 4. Check that the NavPos_02 is sent do the NAD when the conditions are fulfilled. Tested with Lat and Long ERROR values

property.name: Test_Step_5
property.value: 5. Check that the NavPos_02 is sent do the NAD when the conditions are fulfilled. Tested with Lat and Long with NEGATIVES values

property.name: Test_Step_6
property.value: 6. Check that the NavPos_02 is sent do the NAD when the conditions are fulfilled. Tested with Lat and Long with NEGATIVES values

property.name: Description
property.value: Test the reception and processing of the message ESP_10 and the forwarding to NAD

property.name: Expected_7
property.value: Nothing happens, reception and processing of the ESP_10 not done

property.name: Description
property.value: Test the reception and processing of the message ESP_10 and the forwarding to NAD with invalid data

property.name: Test_Step_8
property.value: 1. Check that Signals received in ESP_10 are transfered to NAD with all data zero

property.name: Test_Step_9
property.value: 2. Check that Signals received in ESP_10 are transfered to NAD with invalid data

property.name: Expected_10
property.value: Reception and processing of the ESP_10 with invalid data

property.name: Description
property.value: Test the reception and processing of the message ESP_10 and the forwarding to NAD with valid data

property.name: Test_Step_11
property.value: 1. Check that Signals received in ESP_10 are transfered to NAD

property.name: Description
property.value: Test the reception and processing of the message SARA_11 and the forwarding to NAD

property.name: Expected_12
property.value: Nothing happens, reception and processing of the SARA_11 not done

property.name: Description
property.value: Test the reception and processing of the message SARA_11 and the forwarding to NAD with invalid data

property.name: Test_Step_13
property.value: 1. Check that Signals received in SARA_11 are transfered to NAD

property.name: Description
property.value: Test the reception and processing of the message SARA_11 and the forwarding to NAD with valid data

property.name: Test_Step_14
property.value: 1. Check that Signals received in SARA_11 are transfered to NAD

property.name: Description
property.value: RSTP_CtCarSensorSwc_ReceiveCallback_AsSocketAdapter function check

property.name: Description
property.value: RSTP_CtCarSensorSwc_ReceiveCallback_AsSocketAdapter function check

property.name: Description
property.value: Test the conversion of the 4bit sequence counter to 16bit counter

property.name: Test_Step_15
property.value: 1. Check that rstepSentAllowed doesn't change if Rte return is NOT_OK

property.name: Description
property.value: Test to check the call back function indicating NavPos Map Matched MUX_00

property.name: Description
property.value: Test to check the call back function indicating NavPos Map Matched MUX_01

property.name: Description
property.value: RSTP_CtCarSensorSwc_Channel_Reset_AsSocketAdapter function check
